name: Anticipate Dodge

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dodge, Mobility; base attack bonus +7, brawler level 4th, or monk level 4th.

sections.text: You automatically know whether a creature you can see has a dodge bonus to its AC. You gain up to a +2 bonus on attack rolls against a target that has a dodge bonus. This bonus cannot exceed the dodge bonus of the creature you attack.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: base attack bonus +7, brawler level 4th, or monk level 4th
description: Your knowledge of mobility and your attack prowess allow you to thwart elusive opponents.
